The monitoring system must integrate with both the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster.
Integration with the Mailgun API will provide valuable data on our sending reputation as perceived by our email service provider.
This will likely include metrics related to bounce rates, spam complaints, and overall account health.

Simultaneously, integrating with Gmail Postmaster will offer direct insights into how Gmail, a major recipient domain, views our sending reputation and the deliverability of our emails to their users.
The definition of a "point" drop will need to be aligned with the specific metrics provided by the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster.
Understanding the typical range and variability of reputation scores from both platforms will be important to fine-tune this alerting threshold and avoid excessive or insufficient notifications.4.
Dashboard Widget for Reputation Trends:A dedicated dashboard widget is required to visually represent the historical trends of our email sending reputation.

This widget should display reputation scores over time , allowing us to easily identify patterns , track improvements resulting from any remediation efforts , and proactively detect potential long - term issues .
